QuestData.Title: A Message to Telaar
QuestData.Description: You've been honorable in our dealings, $n, at a time when trust is hard to win among my people.$B$BA large group of my brethren have made their home in the old draenei city of Telaar in Nagrand, to the south. To reach Telaar, take the road south into Nagrand, then continue southeast until you find yourself in the cliffs east of Oshu'gun.$B$BAnyone who has aided us, as you have, would be welcome among the people of Telaar.$B$BSeek out Warden Moi'bff Jill and tell him you have earned my trust.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Warden Moi'bff Jill at Telaar in Nagrand.
QuestData.RewardText: Ikuti is like a brother to me. A friend of his is a friend of mine. You are welcome here, $n, and you have our thanks for assisting our people.
